mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( id, user_id, board_id, content ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{boardId}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT reply.id, reply.user_id AS userId, member.nickname AS userNickname, member.img_url AS userImgUrl, reply.board_id AS boardId, reply.content, reply.created_date AS createDate, reply.updated_date AS updatedDate FROM reply LEFT JOIN member ON reply.user_id = member.id WHERE reply.id = #{replyId} AND reply.is_deleted = 0

SELECT id, userId, userNickname, userImgUrl, boardId, content, createDate, updatedDate FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(reply ${criteria.sorted}) */ rownum AS rn, reply.id, reply.user_id AS userId, member.nickname AS userNickname, member.img_url AS userImgUrl, reply.board_id AS boardId, reply.content, reply.created_date AS createDate, reply.updated_date AS updatedDate FROM reply LEFT JOIN member ON reply.user_id = member.id WHERE reply.board_id = #{criteria.selectId} AND reply.is_deleted = 0 AND ROWNUM <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.pageSize} ) WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNum} - 1) * #{criteria.pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET content = #{content}, updated_date = sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
